page.title: 06Local Character-Mr.C.Cox
page.content: When we wanted to find out some information about the local history of our area, most people suggested that we talked to Mr. Charles Cox - and they were right! For 23 years he served as a councillor on the old Chelmsford RDC and Brentwood DC. For 38 years he has been a member of Ingatestone and Fryerning Parish Council and has been its Vice-Chairman, and a member of many commitees. He joined the Boys' Own Club on its formation in 1919 and in recognition of his services was presented to the Duke of Gloucester in 1958 and to the present Duke in 1978. He has always cared for the village of Fryerning and its Church and has been a member of the choir for 40 years.
